---
title: Manual Debit Memos
---

# Manual Debit Memos


**When  you manually create an entry in a purchase journal debiting the vendor,  a manual debit memo is automatically created. The document number is prefixed  with 'M' to denote it is a manual debit memo.**


**If you do not specify a document number,  the sequence numbers for manual debit memos are automatically generated  based on the settings in the **Location**  profile (path: **File &gt; Setup &gt; Accounting 
 &gt; Location/Sub-Location &gt; Options &gt; Edit &gt; In New Window &gt; 
 Purchase** tab **&gt; Manual Memo 
 #** field) of the logged in location/sub-location. If a sequence  number is not assigned for the login location/sub-location, the sequence  number assigned for the **Default Location**  (path: **File &gt; Setup &gt; Preferences 
 &gt; Defaults &gt; Accounting &gt; Miscellaneous** tab) is used.**


**You can make modifications or accept refunds  from within the manual document profile.**


**View Manual Debit Memos**
: You can view manual debit memos from the **Debit 
 Memos** browser by selecting **Accounting**  from the **View** menu (path: **Debit Memos** browser > **View**  > **Accounting**). Manual debit  memos have a **DM#** that is prefixed  with “M”.  Manual  documents also display “Accounting” in the **Type**  column.


**Modify Manual Debit Memos**
: You can modify manual debit memos from the **Debit Memo** profile just as you would  with system documents. This is the preferred method for making manual  debit memo modifications since only limited modifications are possible  from the purchase journal.


{:.steps}
To modify manual debit memos, do the following:

- From the **Debit Memos** browser, select **View**  > **Accounting**.
- Select the manual  debit memo (The DM# begins with “M” and the **Type**  column displays “Accounting”) and press the **Enter**  key or double-click it. You will see the manual debit memo profile.
- Make the necessary  modifications. You can update any of the following items:


1. Add or edit Document Notes (Click the ![]({{site.pp_baseurl}}/img/note_icon_pur.gif) icon next to the Document #, press **Shift 
 + F6**, or select **Options**  > **Document** > **Document 
 Notes**.)
- Update custom fields (Select **Options**  > **Document** > **Custom 
 fields** or press **Ctl + Alt + C**.)
- Change document alias (Click the ![]({{site.pp_baseurl}}/img/document_alias_icon_pur.gif) icon next to the Document # or press **Ctl 
 + Alt + D**.
- Update fields in the manual debit memo, including  Contact, Ship To, Purchase Rep, Terms, Due date, Override, Tax Invoice  Number and Inv. date, Vendor’s Invoice Number and Date, Shipment Tracking  #, Reference, and Loc/Sub-loc (Location/Sub-Location).
- Click ![]({{site.pp_baseurl}}/img/save_icon_pur.gif)  to  save your changes.



{:.see_also}
See also
: [Create a Debit  Memo]({{site.pp_baseurl}}/return-proc/dms/create-debit-memos/creating_debit_memos.html)
